author: marvin
msg: Fix a bug that would cause regeneration of all autogenerated Boilerplater
files when any .bp file changed, rather than only the relevant subset.

author: markt
msg: Move from a global system property to a per Context attribute for clearing static references.
Change the default as this should no longer be an issue with modern JVMs and the other memory leak protection provided in Tomcat 7.

author: tomwhite
msg: HADOOP-6108. Add support for EBS storage on EC2.

author: marvin
msg: Fix a bug in the Perl binding where an argument of type i64_t could be
truncated to 32 bits when calling back to a function implemented in Perl.
